Contact Details: HESA, 95 Promenade, Cheltenham GL50 1HZ Email official.statistics@hesa.ac.uk  T +44 (0) 1242 211 494
Description: A larger dataset relating to Higher education students.
Name: Higher Education Student Data
Notes: Open Data source available, so this is potentially an easy win dataset. May fit better with an Education family
Route from landing page to data: Data on this page identified via a links towards bottom of page under table column heading table/chart.  Once relevant table link clicked, a data table is presented on a new page, at the bottom of this table is a link to the actual data in CSV form titled Download table (csv) | Download source data (csv).
Sizing Notes: As far as I can see only tables of HE student enrolments by personal characteristics 2013/14 - 2017/18 and when next clicked to reveal further tables, UK domiciled student enrolments by disability and sex 2014/15 to 2017/18  have disability data. Simple table structures and dimensions. CSV format downloadable.
